{{Infobox NCAA team season |Mode=Basketball |Year=2009-10 |Prev year=2008-09 |Next year=2010-11 |Team=Savannah State Lady Tigers wo |Image= |Conference=NCAA Division I independent schools (basketball) |Division= I |ShortConference=Independent |CoachRank= |APRank= |Record=9-21 |ConfRecord= |HeadCoach=Cedric Hardy |AsstCoach1=Billy Hamilton |AsstCoach2=Sonya Wilson |AsstCoach3= |StadiumArena=[[Tiger Arena]] |Champion= |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} The '''2009â10 [[Savannah State Tigers women's basketball|Savannah State Lady Tigers basketball team]]''' competed in American basketball on behalf of [[Savannah State University]] and had a record of 9-21. The Lady Tigers were members of the NCAA Division I-AA, as an independent. The head coach was Cedric Hardy, who served his sixth year. The team played its home games at [[Tiger Arena]] in [[Savannah, Georgia]]. The Lady Tigers entered the season seeking to improve on the 9-22 record posted in the 2008-09 season. ==Season Notes== ===Coaching Staff=== {| border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 90%;" |- |'''Name''' |'''Type''' |'''College''' |'''Graduating year''' |- |Cedric Baker |Head Coach |[[Voorhees College]] |1990 |- |Billy Hamilton |Assistant Coach |[[Albany State University]] |2008 |- |Sonya Wilson |Assistant Coach |[[South Carolina State University]] |1994 |} ===2009-2010 Roster=== {| style="border:5px solid #0000FF;" cellspacing=8 |- align="center" bgcolor="#CC5500" |colspan=7|'''SSU Women's Basketball'''
